template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the fintech space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Design a fintech content campaign from market research to producing blogs, videos, and social posts that maintain a consistent brand voice and track engagement metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 45 words for a fintech content campaign. It needs to include research, multi-format creation, cross-channel consistency, and measurable goals. 

Let me break it down: fintech is the niche, end-to-end means covering all stages. Research comes first, then creating different content types, ensuring brand voice aligns everywhere, and ending with tracking performance. 

I can structure it as a directive task: start with the action verb "Design," specify the research phase, list the content formats briefly, mention channel alignment, and end with the goal measurement. Need to keep it concise but cover all elements. 

Okay, this version hits the key points within the word limit: "Design a fintech content campaign from market research to producing blogs, videos, and social posts that maintain a consistent brand voice and track engagement metrics."
